DOC.brief_summary: To determine the best dose of this investigational agent AG-013736 in combination with various standard of care treatments for advanced solid tumors.
DOC.brief_title: Investigational Agent AG-013736 In Combinations With Standard Of Care Treatments For Patient's With Advanced Solid Tumor
DOC.criteria: Advanced solid tumors suitable for treatment with Taxanes, with or without carboplatin, or treatment with Capecitabine, Gemcitabine/Cisplatin. or Pemetrexed/Cisplatin Tumors abutting or providing support for blood vessels Any significant gastrointestinal abnormalities or active bleeding.
